Articles.Content:
This is my first rover on Duna, but I wanted a garage to go with my Duna Command Center (DCC). So this is what I came up with. The rover is encased inside a protective box to transport it out to Duna and then it can easily land on the surface and deploy. After it lands, you pop the blast doors and the rover can be released. Then the container acts as a garage for the rover and the rover can dock on the surface to a small docking port on the inside of the box!

This rover has vertical takeoff engines, solar panels, parachutes, landing gear, ion engines, and 6 wheel drive, seats 2 Kerbals, has lights.

This thing is fun to roll around on Duna with, just disable the reaction wheel in the middle for optimal performance on Duna. The rover tends to want to leave the ground with it on, so just turn it off.

If you include fuel on the garage or make a duplicate with fuel on it, this rover could be refueled on the surface of Duna!

Check out the video below for the mission and landing.

Download the rover here: Duna Rover

It comes with a launch stage and transfer stage ready to go, just launch it off to Duna or wherever just like I did in the video.

Enjoy!
